name: MrBlueGlowPotatoProtector
description:
The game is free! but you can donate if you want

If you run into any problems with the game then comment about it so I know

Warning: sometimes fullscreen makes the movment controls stop working so its not enabled! I am working on a fix

MrBlueGlowPotatoProtector is a game I made for the ScoreSpace Jam #17

Controls:

shoot at mouse position: LMB

MovementKeys WASD or ArrowKeys Goal: Protect the potato inside of you and get

the highest score by shooting enemies Points: MiniYellow = 1 point MediumRed = 5 points BigPurple = 10 points  SecreatBoss = 100 points ??? Powerups:             GreenGlow = DubbleAttackSpeed for 2 sec +5 points

RedGlow = DubbleDamage for 4 sec +5 points

it might have problems running dowloded files on some devices since I cant test all only have windows if you enjoyed the game consider rating it!
